body: @philsturgeon Is the core captcha helper going to be getting removed eventually with Spark taking over the helper?

issue.title: Can not load numerical field names from Database

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
I have piece of code that pulls weekyears as columnnames from the database.

However, using numerical values does not give those colums back in the results. Perpending the numerical value with a letter , does return the correct results.

Not working code:

SELECT `Merk`, `201302` AS 201302, `201303` AS 201303, `201304` AS 201304, `201305` AS 201305, `201302` + `201303` + `201304` + `201305` AS som FROM (`stats_nebuys_eek_merk`) WHERE `201302` + `201303` + `201304` + `201305` > 100 ORDER BY `201302` + `201303` + `201304` + `201305` DESC LIMIT 15

Working:
SELECT `Merk`, `201302` AS W201302, `201303` AS W201303, `201304` AS W201304, `201305` AS W201305, `201302` + `201303` + `201304` + `201305` AS som FROM (`stats_newbuys_week_merk`) WHERE `201302` + `201303` + `201304` + `201305` > 100 ORDER BY `201302` + `201303` + `201304` + `201305` DESC LIMIT 15

I use $this->db->query($sql); for inserting those queries.

body:
The captcha helper has word length at present, and the example shown has a name attribute, & could have an id attribute.
This looks like a dead issue.
Depends on what you mean by "could have". It can't have an ID attribute unless you modify the helper.

Well, `$cap['image']` is the HTML img tag ... :)
http://www.codeigniter.com/userguide3/helpers/captcha_helper.html#create_captcha

My last comment was incomplete ... the third line of code should have been

```
echo '<input type="text" name="captcha" value="" />';
```

I see that the id/name attributes of the text field are outside fo the captcha helper ... do we need an id/name attribute for the img tag itself? Not a big deal to add ... anyone using this?
Indent code with 4 spaces/a tab or wrap it with `<pre>`.
I checked the latest code. I neither supports **name** nor **id**.  But could be easily added.

issue.title: closing #51. Added img_id and img_name in capcha helper
